title: The Fencing / fortification may be permissiblefor only 10% of total land area around built up structures in the form of chain link without masonry walls thereby keeping the remaining area free for movement of wildlife
clause_text: The Fencing / fortification may be permissiblefor only 10% of total land area around built up structures in the form of chain link without masonry walls thereby keeping the remaining area free for movement of wildlife.
section: The norms for buildings shall be as follows -
